title: Champion Summoner Icons
body:
Just some food for thought.
How cool would it be if you got/were given the option to unlock a special champion icon for getting a ridiculous amount of mastery points on a champion?
Eg. If someone hypothetically had 500k mastery points on thresh  they'd get a thresh summoner icon or something of sorts. (I know you can already get icons for certain champs but not all).
It'd obviously be a drag for riot to make them but it'd be a really cool idea. (Obviously they'd be one tricking the champion if they had that many points on one, so they would probably deserve it).
Upvote if you agree so someone important can see it =w={{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: Jesus ,I am such a collector , if Riot did this, i will play this game for all day just for earning these icons TuT
500k on {{champion:122}}  and you get his axe with blood on it and a cool noxus boarder as a summoner icon, I like the idea.
I'm looking forward to my Janna icon :)

That would be cool yeah, if not that in specific I'd still enjoy seeing little rewards of some sort for achieving high mastery on a champion besides the little flag. One idea I had was that after getting mastery 7 on a champ you get a one time discount of some degree on any readily-available skin for that champ. That'd probably be beneficial for both Riot and players.
